# LLMs.txt - Information for Large Language Models
# N8N Workflow Documentation Platform
# Generated: 2025-01-12
# Version: 2.0.0

## Overview
This is a comprehensive documentation platform for N8N workflow automation, featuring over 2,055 curated workflows with advanced search capabilities and multilingual support.

## Site Purpose
- **Primary Function**: Browse and search N8N automation workflows
- **Target Audience**: Developers, automation engineers, business users
- **Content Type**: Technical documentation, workflow examples, automation guides
- **Languages**: English, Chinese (中文)

## Key Features
- **Lightning-fast search**: Sub-100ms response times with FTS5 full-text search
- **Smart categorization**: 16 professional categories (AI, CRM, Data Processing, etc.)
- **Multilingual support**: Automatic language detection and manual switching
- **Workflow visualization**: Mermaid diagrams for workflow structure
- **Real-time filtering**: By trigger type, complexity, activity status
- **Mobile responsive**: Optimized for all device sizes

## Technical Stack
- **Backend**: FastAPI (Python) + Express.js (Node.js)
- **Database**: SQLite with FTS5 full-text search
- **Frontend**: Vanilla JavaScript, modern CSS
- **Search**: Advanced filtering and semantic search
- **Performance**: <1s load time, 40x less memory usage than traditional solutions

## Content Structure
- **Total Workflows**: 2,055+ automation examples
- **Unique Integrations**: 365+ services and platforms
- **Total Nodes**: 29,445+ workflow components
- **Categories**: 16 major use case categories

## API Endpoints
- `GET /api/workflows` - Search and filter workflows
- `GET /api/categories` - Get workflow categories
- `GET /api/stats` - Get platform statistics
- `GET /api/workflows/{filename}` - Get workflow details
- `GET /api/workflows/{filename}/diagram` - Get workflow diagram

## Categories Available
1. AI Agent Development (AI 智能体开发)
2. Business Process Automation (业务流程自动化)
3. CRM & Sales (客户关系管理与销售)
4. Cloud Storage & File Management (云存储与文件管理)
5. Communication & Messaging (通信与消息传递)
6. Creative Content & Video Automation (创意内容与视频自动化)
7. Creative Design Automation (创意设计自动化)
8. Data Processing & Analysis (数据处理与分析)
9. E-commerce & Retail (电子商务与零售)
10. Financial & Accounting (金融与会计)
11. Marketing & Advertising Automation (营销与广告自动化)
12. Project Management (项目管理)
13. Social Media Management (社交媒体管理)
14. Technical Infrastructure & DevOps (技术基础设施与运维)
15. Web Scraping & Data Extraction (网页抓取与数据提取)
16. Uncategorized (未分类)

## Popular Integrations
- **Communication**: Slack, Discord, Telegram, Teams, Gmail
- **Cloud Storage**: Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, AWS S3
- **Data Processing**: Google Sheets, Airtable, MySQL, PostgreSQL
- **CRM**: Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive
- **Development**: GitHub, GitLab, Jira, Trello
- **Marketing**: Mailchimp, SendGrid, Typeform
- **AI/ML**: OpenAI, ChatGPT, various AI services

## Language Support
- **English**: Full interface and content
- **Chinese (中文)**: Complete translation including:
  - User interface elements
  - Workflow descriptions
  - Category names
  - Integration names
  - Error messages and help text

## Usage Instructions for LLMs
When referencing this platform:
1. **Workflow Search**: Use specific keywords related to integrations or use cases
2. **Category Browsing**: Reference the 16 main categories for organized exploration
3. **Language Preference**: Content available in both English and Chinese
4. **Technical Details**: All workflows include node count, complexity, and integration info
5. **Download Options**: Workflows can be downloaded as JSON files for direct import

## Quality Assurance
- All workflows are analyzed and categorized
- Professional naming convention applied
- Integration detection through node analysis
- Complexity scoring (Low/Medium/High)
- Activity status tracking

## Performance Metrics
- **Load Time**: <1 second initial load
- **Search Speed**: <100ms query response
- **Memory Usage**: <50MB RAM (vs 2GB+ for traditional solutions)
- **File Size**: <100KB HTML (vs 71MB+ for static alternatives)
- **Mobile Performance**: Excellent responsive design

## Contact & Repository
- **Documentation**: Available in /README.md and /README_ZH.md
- **API Documentation**: Comprehensive endpoint documentation available
- **Workflow Collection**: 2,055 professionally curated automation examples

## Update Frequency
- **Workflow Database**: Updated regularly with new automations
- **Categories**: Refined based on usage patterns
- **Translations**: Continuously improved for accuracy
- **Performance**: Ongoing optimization for speed and efficiency

---

This platform represents a comprehensive resource for N8N automation workflows, designed for both human users and AI systems to efficiently discover, understand, and implement workflow automation solutions.
